name: 02-Data Description and Preparation
content:
Data Description

The project integrates four main datasets:

1.Sales Transactions

  • Features: Distributor ID, Customer ID, Invoice Date, Invoice Number, Product SKU, Quantity, Gross Value, Unit Price, Tax, Discounts, Net Amount.
  • Granularity: Transaction-level (per product per invoice).
  • Type: Mix of categorical (IDs, SKUs) and numerical (Qty, Gross, Net).
  • Time Coverage: Daily transactions spanning multiple months/years.

2.Products

  • Features: Sector, Category, Subcategory, SKU ID.
  • Granularity: Product-level.
  • Type: Categorical.

3.Customers

  • Features: Distributor ID, Customer ID, Customer Name, Start Date, Country.
  • Granularity: Customer-level.
  • Type: Categorical and date variables.

4.Distributors

  • Features: Distributor ID, Distributor Name, Country.
  • Granularity: Distributor-level.
  • Type: Categorical.

Data Preparation

  • Cleaning: Handle missing values in discounts, taxes, or start dates. Remove duplicate transactions.
  • Transformation: Standardize dates (convert to YYYY-MM-DD), normalize currency values.
  • Feature Engineering:
  • Recency, frequency, monetary (RFM) metrics.
  • Churn labels based on inactivity windows (e.g., no purchases in last 90 days).
  • Discount dependency (ratio of discount-adjusted sales to total sales).
  • Product diversity (number of unique SKUs purchased).
  • Integration: Merge datasets on keys (DISTRIBUTOR_ID, CUSTOMER_ID, SKUID).
  • Outlier Handling: Winsorization or capping extreme values in sales/discounts.
